3-D long-term pancreatic progenitor spheroid (PP-spheroid) culture protocol


Preparation of PP-spheroid expansion medium and other reagents

1.

FGF2 (human bFGF), 64 ng/ml (Peprotech 100-18B)

B27, 1 X (Thermofisher 17504044)

ROCK inhibitor Y-27632, 10 µM (Calbiochem 616464)


2.
Thawed growth factor reduced Matrigel (Fisher Scientific 354277).

Dissociation reagents: TrypLE (Thermofisher 12604013) and 0.25% Trypsin+0.5 M EDTA

4.
Heat inactivated FBS) or 10% FBS in DMEM/F12, Glutamax medium.

5 ml tubes with 35 µm cell strainer snap cap (Fisher Scientific 10585801)

7.

Freezing medium: 80% FBS or KOSR + 20% DMSO


Culture protocol of hPSC-derived PP-spheroids

1.

Differentiate hPSCs to pancreatic progenitors using Ameri protocol (Ameri et al., 2010) or Rezania protocol (Rezania et al., 2014) until the end of stage 4 (St4d8 in Ameri or St4d3 in Rezania).

2.

Incubate for 3-5 min, until cells are rounded up and about to detach.

5.
Add equal volume of Hi-FBS or 5X 10% FBS to the well and gently
Transfer all the suspensions through cell strainer (5 ml tubes with 35 µm cell strainer snap cap) and

Centrifuge the dissociated cells at 500 g for 3 min.

7.

Adjust cell concentration in PEm to 4x106/ml.

9.
Place them on a pre-cold Eppendorf tube on ice for 4 well of 4-well
Add 3X volume of thawed Matrigel to the cold cells, and

Mix well by pipetting up and down at least 20X. Important, avoid making bubbles!

11.

Mix on to each well by pipetting slowly to make a dome.

12.

Plate in the incubator without adding medium for 10 min for the gel to solidify.

13.
Add 500 µl of pre-warmed PEm to each well, and

Passage cells in every 10 days.


Passaging PP-spheroids

1.
Wash the wells once with 1 ml PBS<sup>-/-</sup> and

Break Matrigel by pipetting up and down a few times.

3.
Prepare a 15 ml falcon tubes per

Plate with equal vol of Hi-FBS or 5X 10% FBS per tube on ice.

5.
Add 500 µl/well of inactivation reagent and
Pipette up and down a few times to help break down Matrigel and to

Transfer cells in solution to the tube with inactivation reagent.

6.

Spin down at 500 g for 3 minutes.

7.
Move supernatant from the tubes and
Transfer all the suspensions through cell strainer (5 ml tubes with 35 µm cell strainer snap cap).
Count the cells resuspended in PEm (
Keep notes of the cell count, total suspension volume and number of wells in suspension).

Take required number of cells in suspension (40,000 cells/well) into a 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube.

10.
Spin down at 500 g for 3 min, and
Move excessive supernatant to make 4000 cells/µl concentration.

This way, you are keeping 40,000 cells in 10 µl volume for 1 well.

11.
Mix well by pipetting up and down ~20X to distribute cells homogeneously in Matrigel.

Mix on to each well by pipetting slowly to make a dome.

13.

Plate in the incubator without adding medium for 10 min for the gel to solidify.

14.
Add 500 µl of pre-warmed PEm to each well, and

Passage cells in every 10 days.


Freezing PP-spheroids for cryopreservation: whole-PP-spheroid freezing (1 cryovial/well of 4-well plate)

1.
Wash the wells once with 1ml PBS<sup>-/-</sup> and

Break Matrigel by pipetting up and down a few times.

2.

Incubate 1-2 min at 37°C just to free spheres from Matrigel.

3.
Add equal volume of ice-cold Hi-FBS, and

Spin down at 500 g for 3 min.

4.
Transfer 200 µl cell suspension to cryovial, and

Add equal volume of ice-cold freezing medium.

6.
Place the cryovials in Mr. Frosty and

Place the vials in liquid nitrogen tank.


Defrosting cryopreserved PP-spheroids and culture

1.

Warm PEm, 10% FBS + 10 µM ROCK inhibitor Y-27632 in DMEM/F12, Glutamax (5X volume of cryopreserved cell solution), and 4-well plate.

2.
Add 0.5 - 1 ml of prewarmed 10% FBS + 10 µM ROCK inhibitor Y-27632 in DMEM/F12, Glutamax
Tranfer the PP-spheroid suspension into the falcon tube with 10% FBS + 10 µM ROCK inhibitor Y-27632 in DMEM/F12, Glutamax, and

Spin down at 500 g for 3 min.

4.
Add 3X volume Matrigel to the PP-spheroid suspension and

Mix well by pipetting up and down around 20 times.

6.

Mix on to each well by pipetting slowly to make a dome.

7.

Plate in the incubator without adding medium for 10 min for the gel to solidify.

8.
Add 500 µl of pre-warmed PEm to each well, and
Passage cells when PP-spheroids become confluent at day 5-7.
